message: No. Seems like a cool idea, although I'd be worried that if I got used to that custom scheme, I'd have to change the hotkeys on every computer I play SC on.
The default hotkeys aren't too tough to remember after 5 or 6 games of really trying
I tried it for a while then just settled on the defaults
Grid hotkeys are kinda sketchy if you're playing Zerg.. if you select larva repeatedly you'll accidentally build units

I just customized mine to make them a little more efficient.  I made every upgrade building in the game use the keys a s d for their upgrades and made obvious switches like putting build immortal and interceptor on T instead of the very annoying i
@courtland iirc, custom hotkeys are carried with your bnet profile, so theory, they should be restored when you log in.  i could be wrong, hough
Someone was telling me that the custom hotkeys stuff never really picked up in the pro scene. Something along the lines of different accounts being used by different people.
i moved control group 8 to Q
the only hotkey modification i made was make the ~ key a second "a" attack key.  meaning stead of doing 1a2a3a, i can do 1`2`3`.
@dz as an owner of the 1a2a3a hoodie, this is unacceptable
